name: Cube's hidden dimensions
description:
Welcome into Cube's world !

Cube is traveling through the several dimensions in its world, and you must help him go the farthest away possible !

In this dynamic platformer, you'll be able to travel through 3 dimensions, including physics particularities, and style change. You'll also be able to compete with other players, by comparing your scores on the global leaderboard!

Have fun!
